title: The Manga Guide to Physiology (gnv64)
description:
The Manga Guide to Physiology
by Etsuro Tanaka and Keiko Koyama
No Starch Press | November 2015 | ISBN-10: 1593274408 | 256 Pages | True PDF | 31.4 mb

Like all of the Manga Guide educational series, the guide to Physiology is fun, well illustrated (for both learning and entertainment), written by a subject matter expert, and extremely well organized for learning in this case containing easier Manga Comic explanations and succinct textual explanations giving further detail. Whether you want to understand basic in office Medical Tests including EKG's Spirometery and Blood Pressure Measurements, are taking a physiology course as part of Allied Health Professional Education, or "merely" want to understand the processes that make your human body work, this book is understandable and highly edifying.
Recommended, for students, health professional education, and anyone who wants to know how their body works.

About the Author
Etsuro Tanaka is a Doctor of Medicine who specializes in physiology and nutritional science. A professor in the Tokyo University of Agriculture Faculty of Applied Bio-Science, he has also written several popular physiology textbooks for nursing students.
